title: Fortgeschrittene Gespräche: Emre Can und Julian Brandt vor Unterschrift bis 2028
snippet: Emre Can und Julian Brandt stehen offenbar kurz davor, ihre auslaufenden Verträge bei Borussia Dortmund zu verlängern.

title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: On 31 January 2020, Borussia Dortmund announced Can's signing on loan until the end of the 2019–20 season, with an obligation to buy. On 8 February, Can made his debut for Dortmund, also scoring a goal in a 4–3 away loss to Bayer Leverkusen. On 18 February 2020, the deal was made permanent on a four-year contract for €25 million, with the loan still expiring at the end of the 2019–20 season.

title: CONFIRMED: Emre Can will depart from Team Burrusia Dortmund after 2025 season……
snippet: Borussia Dortmund has officially confirmed that captain Emre Can will leave the club at the end of the 2025 season, bringing an end to what has been a defining chapter in both the player’s career and the team’s recent history.
